EqvAva# rundhE pa~jcadaqSO Ba#vatIndriqyamEqvAva# rundhE saptadaqSO Ba#vatyaqnnAdyaqsyA va#ruddhyAq athOq praiva tEna# jAyata Ekaviq(gm)qSO Ba#vatiq prati#ShThityAq athOq ruca#mEqvA&&*tman dha#ttE triNaqvO Ba#vatiq viji#tyai 
pa~jcaviq(gm)qSO$-&gniShTOqmO Ba#vati praqjApa#tEqrAptyai# mahAvraqtavA#-naqnnAdyaqsyA va#ruddhyai viSvaqjith sarva#pRuShThO &tirAqtrO Ba#vatiq sarva#syAqBiji#tyaiq yat praqtyakShaqM pUrvEqShvaha#ssu pRuqShThAnyu#pEqyuH praqtyakSha#M -[  ] 6
